metadata.title: CVE-2023-21031 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In setPowerMode of HWC2.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds read due toa race condition. This could lead to local information disclosure with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-13Android ID: A-242688355

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-native package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
